item.title: About IMTorg
item.description: This blog site is a knowledge base of various innovations produced by Information Management Technologies. If you would like to learn more, please contact us. We’ve helped many firms of all sizes, both commercial and public, including the following: STG National Institutes of Health Global Association of Risk Proffesionals US Department of State Wisconsin Department of Transportation multiple start-ups
